seoTitle: Forklift Repair, Preventive Maintenance & Fleet Management | Lift Pros
seoDescription: Expert forklift and material handling equipment repair, scheduled preventive maintenance, fleet management, and mobile field service across California's Central Valley.
heroDescription: From emergency breakdowns to scheduled PM programs, our mobile technicians and shop team keep your equipment productive and your operations moving.

serviceCards.title: Repair & Diagnostics
serviceCards.description: Engine, transmission, hydraulic, electrical, and brake repair for all makes and models. In-shop and on-site service available.

serviceCards.title: Field Service
serviceCards.description: Our technicians come to you with fully stocked service vans. GPS-tracked dispatch across the entire Central Valley.

serviceCards.title: Preventive Maintenance
serviceCards.description: Scheduled PM programs tailored to your fleet. Multi-point inspections, fluid services, and compliance documentation included.

serviceCards.title: Fleet Management
serviceCards.description: Full lifecycle management for your equipment fleet. Service history, cost tracking, warranty management, and reporting.

serviceCards.title: Service Contracts
serviceCards.description: Lock in rates and priority response times with a service agreement. Custom contracts based on fleet size and usage patterns.

serviceCards.title: Warranty Support
serviceCards.description: We track warranty coverage across your fleet and handle claims. Authorized warranty service for TAILIFT and other brands.

bannerText: Our technicians come to your location with the parts and tools to get you running.
equipSubtitle: If it's in your warehouse or on your dock, we can fix it.

equipCards.title: Scissor Lifts

equipCards.title: Narrow Aisle & Cold Storage
equipCards.description: Reach trucks, order pickers, turret trucks, and freezer-rated equipment.
